title: Todamont
author: Todamont
content: I'm looking for the 1g silver rounds sold in this thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=23256.0There are not even many good images of this coin, but one is here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=23256.msg432272#msg432272It will look like this larger 1oz round, produced in memorium of the earlier tokens, shown here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=23256.msg16860668#msg16860668Willing to pay above fair market value or trade for other early edition MJB Monetary Metals rounds to help you complete a set. PM or post here if you have one of these rare rounds and are willing to make a deal! Thanks~

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Going to be very difficult to find. I've got version 1 I believe and have tried finding version 2 for years with no luck. Â There's a couple people around here with them but they aren't selling, at least not for anything reasonable.
